name: Save The Moon (Indieology)
description:
Defend the moon from invaders! Can you get the best score?

Unfortunately couldn't get the HTML export working by the submission deadline, so I provided Windows, Mac, and Linux  downloads instead for now.  

After Jam voting ends,  I will be adding new enemies as well.

Music:
Space Floating by | e s c p | https://escp-music.bandcamp.com
